data.eml:eml: Review of Australasian spider flies (Diptera, Acroceridae) with a revision of Panops Lamarck

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Winterton, Shaun L. (2012): Review of Australasian spider flies (Diptera, Acroceridae) with a revision of Panops Lamarck. ZooKeys 172: 7-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.172.1889, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.172.1889
